product_overview: Vitan Task Management is a comprehensive full-stack application designed to streamline task, project, team, and contact management, integrating seamless authentication and WhatsApp communication features with rich analytics and a responsive user interface.
core_goals: Provide robust task and project management with advanced filtering, sorting, and assignment capabilities.
Enable secure and flexible user authentication via OAuth, WhatsApp OTP, and email login methods.
Support efficient team collaboration with role-based access and user management features.
Integrate WhatsApp Business API for communication and two-factor authentication.
Deliver insightful analytics for tasks, projects, and team performance.
Ensure accessibility, responsiveness, and high usability across all user interfaces.
Maintain high security standards with session management, token validation, and error handling.
key_features: Enhanced multi-method authentication including OAuth, WhatsApp OTP, and email login with robust error handling and session management.
Comprehensive task management system with CRUD operations, advanced filters, status tracking, and assignment management.
Full project lifecycle management including team assignments, milestone tracking, and project-specific task organization.
Template system for reusable task creation with stable UI components.
Team management with user role assignments, invitations, and profile editing.
WhatsApp API integration for messaging, webhook handling, and verification OTP flows.
Rich analytics dashboard with interactive charts, task metrics, and team performance data.
Main dashboard aggregating quick actions, recent activities, and statistics for easy navigation.
Performance-optimized React UI components with accessibility and responsive design.
Robust API client layer ensuring reliable communication with backend services and external APIs.
Comprehensive modal and dialog management with accessibility and focus control.
Full frontend and backend testing infrastructure with unit, integration, and e2e tests.
user_flow_summary: User navigates to the application and logs in using OAuth, WhatsApp OTP, or email credentials.
User accesses the main dashboard displaying recent activities and quick actions.
User creates, edits, assigns, and tracks tasks using task management interfaces with filtering and sorting.
User manages projects, assigns team members, and tracks project milestones via project management UI.
User utilizes the template system to create common task structures efficiently.
Team managers add, edit, and invite team members, assigning roles and managing user profiles.
User interacts with WhatsApp features for messaging and OTP verification.
User views analytics dashboards showing real-time metrics on tasks, projects, and team performance.
User navigates through the app via React Router with protected routes and deep linking.
Modals and dialogs provide seamless interaction for forms, confirmations, and editing workflows with proper validation and error feedback.
validation_criteria: All authentication flows must validate credentials and handle errors gracefully with secure session management.
Task operations support full CRUD with proper validation, error handling, and UI updates.
Project management features allow team assignments and milestone updates with permission checks.
Templates can be created, edited, and applied without UI errors or validation issues.
Team management correctly handles role assignments, invitations, and profile updates.
WhatsApp integration supports message sending, receiving, OTP verification, and webhook processing reliably.
Analytics dashboard displays accurate, real-time data with interactive charts and key metrics.
Frontend UI components render responsively across devices and pass accessibility guidelines.
Navigation is seamless with URL parameter support, protected routes, and browser history management.
Test coverage for frontend and backend is complete with 100% pass rates in unit, integration, and e2e tests.
Error responses are consistent with defined HTTP status codes and error message formats.
Security measures including JWT handling, localStorage cleanup, and rate limiting are enforced throughout the app.

features.name: Enhanced Authentication System
features.description: Comprehensive multi-method authentication with OAuth, WhatsApp OTP, and email login. Features enhanced error handling, session management, and security validation.

features.name: OAuth Authentication Integration
features.description: Complete OAuth login system with client-side validation, error handling, and secure token management. Includes fallback mechanisms and comprehensive security measures.

features.name: WhatsApp OTP Verification
features.description: Two-factor authentication via WhatsApp with verification code system, modal stability, and enhanced error handling.

features.name: Task Management System
features.description: Complete CRUD operations for tasks with advanced filtering, sorting, assignment management, and status tracking. Features enhanced dropdown functionality.

features.name: Enhanced Task Assignment
features.description: Improved task assignment system with team member selection, debugging capabilities, and fallback messages for empty user lists.

features.name: Advanced Task Filtering
features.description: Comprehensive filtering system with search, priority, status, and assignee filters. Features working 'Clear all' functionality.

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Complete project lifecycle management with team assignment, milestone tracking, and project-specific task organization.

features.name: Template System
features.description: Task template creation and management with fixed SelectItem components, eliminating Radix UI errors and supporting project assignment.

features.name: Team Management
features.description: User and team member management with role assignment, profile editing, and team collaboration features.

features.name: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive analytics with task metrics, team performance tracking, priority breakdowns, and interactive charts.

features.name: Main Dashboard
features.description: Central dashboard with quick actions, recent activity, statistics overview, and navigation to all major features.

features.name: WhatsApp Integration
features.description: Complete WhatsApp Business API integration with message processing, contact management, and interactive commands.

features.name: Performance-Optimized UI Components
features.description: Highly optimized React components with fixed duplicate key warnings, enhanced rendering performance, and stable component keys.

features.name: API Client Layer
features.description: Robust API communication layer with retry logic, error handling, authentication management, and comprehensive request/response processing.

features.name: Security & Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive security measures including localStorage cleanup, session management, authentication validation, and robust error handling throughout the application.

features.name: Modal & Dialog Management
features.description: Enhanced modal stability with prevention of unexpected closures, proper focus management, and accessibility features.

features.name: Testing Infrastructure
features.description: Comprehensive testing framework with Jest unit tests, Playwright E2E tests, component testing, and multi-browser automation.

features.name: Form Validation & Input Handling
features.description: Client-side validation for forms including email format validation, password strength checks, and input sanitization.

features.name: Navigation & Routing
features.description: React Router-based navigation with protected routes, dynamic navigation, and proper URL handling for SPA.

features.name: Utility Functions & Helpers
features.description: Helper functions for date handling, phone number normalization, country codes, and design system utilities.
